Description.div:
The Price List master table. Stores a list of valid price lists for an organization.
Either PriceSetKey or both {OrganizationCode and PriceSetName} should be passed to identify a unique record. This API deletes records from YFS_Price_Set, YFS_Item_Price_Set, YFS_Item_Price_Set_Dtls, and YFS_Price_Program_Defn.
